\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 75208}

\subsection*{Not Bad}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{coleus1}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 4 hits & smoked & Salvia officinalis & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 132.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
one day i read up on different salvias and so i look through my garden and sure enough theres some right there. i pick 5 leaves and dry them out. i take one large hit and hold it in for 30 seconds. i did this four times. finally when i was done i felt a buzz. my entire body was buzzing. it felt like electricity, it was pretty nice.

 the effects wore off after about 2 hours but tottally worth it!
